Summary Note:
Gitte Andrea Petersen and the RM crossed paths at a mutual friend's dinner party in Copenhagen. They discovered they had many common acquaintances and decided to explore business opportunities together.
Gitte Andrea Petersen is a 66 year old retired CEO from Denmark. She has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
She decided to join Julius Baer for its renowned wealth management services and personalized client approach.
Family Background: Gitte Andrea Petersen is currently widowed. She has 1 kid called Thomsen.
Education Background:
Gitte completed her secondary education at Frederikshavn Gymnasium in 1977.
Gitte received her degree from International Business Academy (IBA) in 1983.
Gitte earned her additionally degree from University College Absalon in 1987.
Occupation History:
Gitte Andrea Petersen is a seasoned professional with over 42 years of experience.
At  Marriott International Danmark A/S, Gitte Andrea Petersen held the position of Hotel Manager from 1983 to 1986, developing essential skills in the field.
At Scandic Hotels Danmark A/S, she held the position of General Manager from 1986 to 1991, making significant contributions to the organization.
At Radisson Hotel Group Danmark A/S, she worked as a Regional Vice President from 1992 to 1997, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
After 14 years of dedication, she assumed the role of CEO at Choice Hotels Danmark A/S in 1999, spearheading high-profile projects and mentoring junior colleagues.
Wealth Summary:
She managed to save approximately 7940000 DKK from her earnings at all companies.
Her remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Næstved, Helsingør and Vejle, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
She does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: Based on the information provided, we are excited about the client's financial journey and look forward to supporting her in achieving her financial goals.
